TopicTitle: my game keeps crashing when i burn or timewarp on the map screen

Articles.Content:
i have been using the same stack of mods for like a year now and nothing has happened but just now this crash is starting to happen almost every 15 minutes

can someone please help me find a solution that would be great

Hello @OPTICALITY657

This post is getting old, I hope you found a solution.

 

I am no expert. here is my 2¢.

My thought is that one one your files got corrupted, Maybe.

Perhaps you have done this already but.

Copy your save folder somewhere safe.

Re-install the game.

Try the fresh copy.

Copy your save folder into the fresh game.

 

Hope this works for you.

 

ME

Yup! Every time I get  a bug I delete and re-install.

Works like a charm!

 

"60% of the time it works every time!"
